title: DSC Mairang 2025
passage: Optional passage text here if any.

questions.question: Krem Tirot is located at
questions.solution: Krem Tirot Sing refers to the caves where Tirot Sing hid, not the warrior himself. It is located in Nongkhlaw. U Tirot Sing was a Khasi chief who led a resistance against the British in the 19th century. He is remembered as a freedom fighter who fought against British control of the Khasi Hills from 1829 to 1833, ultimately dying in captivity in Dhaka in 1835.

questions.question: There are _____ colleges in Eastern-West Khasi Hills District.
questions.solution: There are only 3 colleges in the District. They are: Tirot Sing Memorial College, Mairang Presbyterian Science College, and Khadsawphra College & Higher Secondary School.

questions.question: Thup Thup Falls of Nongliput village is associate with _____ river.
There are _____ members in the District Selection Committee, Mairang.
questions.solution: As per the official website of Meghalaya, every District Selection Committee, Meghalaya shall have five Members.

questions.question: (Lt.) Shri. Hoping Stone Lyngdoh was laid to rest at _____ village.
Markham is famous for its _____
questions.solution: Markham Valley is famous for its beautiful landscapes.

questions.question: The capital of Telengana
The World Health Day is observed in every
The Capital of Arunachal Pradesh is
questions.solution:
Itanagar is the capital of Arunachal Pradesh
Agartala is the capital of Tripura
Gangtok is the capital of Sikkim
Dispur is the capital of Assam

questions.question: Mahabharata is a book associated with
questions.solution:
Correct Answer: Hinduism
Mahabharata is one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India and is associated with Hinduism.
It contains the Bhagavad Gita and narrates the Kurukshetra war.
Buddhism, Islam, and Jainism do not have Mahabharata as part of their scriptures.

questions.question: The Hornbill Festival is celebrated in which state?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer: Nagaland
The Hornbill Festival is the largest cultural festival in Nagaland, showcasing Naga tribal dances, music, and traditions.
Manipur celebrates the Sangai Festival, highlighting its arts, dance, and handicrafts.
Arunachal Pradesh celebrates the Losar Festival, marking the Tibetan New Year with rituals and cultural events.
Mizoram celebrates Chapchar Kut, a harvest festival featuring folk dances and community feasts.

questions.question: Gautam Gambhir is associated with which sport?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer: Cricket
Gautam Gambhir is a former Indian cricketer who played as an opening batsman in Tests and One Day Internationals for India.

questions.question: Mawthadraishan C&RD Block is located at _____ village.
questions.solution: Mawthadraishan C&RD Block headquarters is located at Nongshillong village.

questions.question: Hima Khatsawphra is the name of a Khasi State, also known as:
questions.solution: Hima Khatsawphra is also known as Hima Nongkhlaw.

questions.question: In which year Eastern West Khasi Hills District was inaugurated?
questions.solution: The Eastern West Khasi Hills District was officially inaugurated on 10th November 2021. It is one of Meghalaya’s newest districts, with its headquarters at Mairang. The district is known for its rich Khasi cultural heritage, notable landmarks such as Kyllang Rock, scenic valleys, and its administrative setup comprising the Mairang and Mawthadraishan C&RD Blocks.

questions.question: The State Animal of Meghalaya is
questions.solution:
Clouded Leopard is the State Animal of Meghalaya.

Black Panther is the State Animal of Karnataka.
Tiger is the National Animal of India and also the State Animal of several states including Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, and West Bengal.
Black Bear (Himalayan Black Bear) is the State Animal of Himachal Pradesh.

questions.question: The Banyan tree (Ficus benghalensis) is the National Tree of which country?
questions.solution:
The Banyan tree (Ficus benghalensis) is the National Tree of India.

Tibet does not have an officially declared national tree, but the Poplar is culturally important.
Nepal’s National Tree is Rhododendron arboreum (Lali Gurans).
Thailand’s National Tree is the Ratchaphruek (Golden Shower Tree).
India’s National Tree is the Banyan Tree (Ficus benghalensis).

questions.question: The present Honorable M.D.C. of 23 Mairang Nongkhlaw District Council Constituency is
questions.solution:
Shri S. Warjri is a Meghalaya Civil Service officer in senior administrative roles.

Shri B. Rynthathiang is the MDC of the Mairang constituency.

Shri E. Nongrang (Shri Equator L. Nongrang) is the MDC of the 23 Mairang–Nongkhlaw constituency and a UDP member.

Shri B. Sohkhlet (Powell Sohkhlet) is the MDC of the 24 Pariong–Mawthadraishan constituency and an Executive Member in KHADC.

questions.question: Allium sativum refers to
questions.solution:
Allium sativum refers to Garlic.

Onion: Allium cepa
Chilly (Chili Pepper): Capsicum annuum
Pepper (Black Pepper): Piper nigrum
Garlic: Allium sativum

questions.question: *Mawthadraishan Peak* falls under ____ village.
questions.solution:
*Mawthadraishan Peak* is commonly said to be in Mawphanlur village according to local accounts.

Other sources mention nearby villages such as Mawroh, Nongshillong, Markasa, or Lawdisai. The exact village may vary depending on the route or local interpretation.

questions.question: The Hon'ble former Chief Minister of Meghalaya Shri. D. D. Lapang passed away on
questions.solution: Shri D. D. Lapang, former Chief Minister of Meghalaya, passed away on 12 September 2025 at Bethany Hospital, Shillong.

questions.question: U Syiem Tirot Sing died in
questions.solution:
U Syiem Tirot Sing died in Dhaka while imprisoned by the British.

Other options might seem plausible because:
- Sylhet: British troops and administrative posts were active here during the Khasi resistance.
- Chittagong: Also part of British Bengal Presidency; some may confuse regional locations.
- Chattak: Another nearby region; sometimes cited mistakenly in local narratives due to proximity.
However, historical records confirm Dhaka as the place of his death.

questions.question: The Hon’ble Finance Minister of India is
questions.solution:
Smt. N. Sitharaman is the current Finance Minister of India.

Other options are prominent ministers but hold different portfolios:
- Shri Rajnath Singh is Defence Minister.
- Shri Amit Shah is Home Minister.
- Shri Arjun Munda serves as Minister for Tribal Affairs (among other roles).

questions.question: The full form of BJP is
questions.solution: BJP stands for Bharatiya Janata Party, one of the major political parties in India.

questions.question: There are ___ Lok Sabha seats in Meghalaya
questions.solution: Meghalaya has two Lok Sabha constituencies: Shillong and Tura.
